constructor-arg.value: update cpa set cpa=#[map-payload:cpa] where cpa_id=#[map-payload:cpa_id]

insert into ebms_message (time_stamp, cpa_id, conversation_id, sequence_nr, message_id, message_type, message_original, message_header, message_manifest, status, status_date) values (#[map-payload:time_stamp], #[map-payload:cpa_id], #[map-payload:conversation_id], #[map-payload:sequence_nr], #[map-payload:message_id], #[map-payload:message_type], #[map-payload:message_original], #[map-payload:message_header], #[map-payload:message_manifest], #[map-payload:status], GETDATE())
select id from ebms_message where ack_type is null and next_retry_time < GETDATE()
update ebms_message set nr_retries=nr_retries+1, next_retry_time=null where id=#[map-payload:ID]
update ebms_message set ack_type=#[map-payload:ack_type], ack_header=#[map-payload:ack_header], ack_content=#[map-payload:ack_content] where id=#[map-payload:id]
update ebms_message set ack_type=0, ack_header=#[map-payload:ack_header], ack_content=#[map-payload:ack_content] where id=#[map-payload:id]
update ebms_message set ack_type=1, ack_header=#[map-payload:ack_header], ack_content=#[map-payload:ack_content] where id=#[map-payload:id]
update ebms_message set status=#[map-payload:status], status_date=GETDATE() where id=#[map-payload:id]
update ebms_message set next_retry_time=null where id=#[map-payload:id]
